section.title: EVMHostList
section.para: EVMHostList retrieves all of the id and name values of the Host instances stored in the VMDB.

listitem.para: Output: VMdbWs..HostListArray. Each VmdbWs..HostList object contains the guid and name of a host.

formalpara.title: Examples
formalpara.para: The following examples demonstrate EVMHostList usage:

example.title: EVMHostList WSDL
example.programlisting:
<message name="EVMHostList"> </message> <message name="EVMHostListResponse"> <part name="return" type="typens:VmdbwsSupport..HostListArray"/> </message>
<xsd:complexType name="VmdbwsSupport..HostList"> <xsd:all> <xsd:element name="guid" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:all> </xsd:complexType>

example.title: EVMHostList Output (Java)
example.screen: Calling EVMHostList... 988be7ca-6c66-11dc-9322-005056b30b86, ESX21.Chicago.MIQ 98957452-6c66-11dc-9322-005056b30b86, ESX7.Mahwah.MIQ 9898d76e-6c66-11dc-9322-005056b30b86, ESX43.Seattle.MIQ 989a5580-6c66-11dc-9322-005056b30b86, ESX54.Dallas.MIQ 749b33e0-3a2d-11dc-8a0d-001641a27095, bhm65@redhat.com 024ba2a6-5d51-11dc-b10b-0017f2d3eb46, luke.redhat.com 02982fb8-5d51-11dc-b10b-0017f2d3eb46, esx1dev.redhat.com 02bb853a-5d51-11dc-b10b-0017f2d3eb46, yoda.redhat.com
